Text.Page:
Looking for giant carnivorous plants, are you? Well you've come the right place!

This is the Garden of Yativio, the king of corpse flowers!

Why’s Yativio the king, you ask? Well you see, it’s toxin is so deadly that even a single drop can kill in moments.

Anything with that much sway over life and death deserves to be called the king of its kind, don’t you think? Though I suppose we could have went with "queen" of corpse flowers... hmm, anyway...
